languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, разведчикам удалось спасти нескольких истощенных офицеров с разрушенного корабля. Несмотря на раны, они смогли поведать о случившемся: во время патруля фрегат обнаружил корабль эльдаров, пересекающий систему, и решил незамедлительно атаковать врагов Человечества. Судно ксеносов оказалось слишком быстрым и юрким, но в какой-то момент его двигатели отказали, предоставив фрегату шанс на атаку".

"Lord Captain, the scouts managed to rescue several emaciated officers from the wrecked ship. Despite their wounds, they were able to tell us what had happened: during a patrol, the frigate discovered an Aeldari ship crossing the system and decided to immediately attack the enemies of Humanity. The xenos vessel proved too fast and skittish, but at one point its engines failed, giving the frigate a chance to attack."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, разведчикам удалось спасти нескольких истощенных офицеров с разрушенного корабля. Несмотря на раны, они смогли поведать о случившемся: во время патруля фрегат обнаружил корабль эльдаров, пересекающий систему, и решил незамедлительно атаковать врагов Человечества. languages.text: “舰长大人，侦察兵从失事的舰船中救出了几名奄奄一息的军官。尽管他们受了伤，但他们告诉了我们之前发生的事情。他们的护卫舰在巡逻过程中，发现一艘艾达灵族的飞船穿越星系，于是他们决定立刻对人类之敌发动攻击。尽管异形的飞船过于灵活，根本无法击中，但异形飞船的引擎在战斗中突然失灵，护卫舰抓住这个机会进行了攻击。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the scouts managed to rescue several emaciated officers from the wrecked ship. Despite their wounds, they were able to tell us what had happened: during a patrol, the frigate discovered an Aeldari ship crossing the system and decided to immediately attack the enemies of Humanity. The xenos vessel proved too fast and skittish, but at one point its engines failed, giving the frigate a chance to attack."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，侦察兵从失事的舰船中救出了几名奄奄一息的军官。尽管他们受了伤，但他们告诉了我们之前发生的事情。他们的护卫舰在巡逻过程中，发现一艘艾达灵族的飞船穿越星系，于是他们决定立刻对人类之敌发动攻击。尽管异形的飞船过于灵活，根本无法击中，但异形飞船的引擎在战斗中突然失灵，护卫舰抓住这个机会进行了攻击。”

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, les éclaireurs sont parvenus à sauver plusieurs officiers émaciés du vaisseau en détresse. Ils ont pu nous raconter ce qu'il s'est passé malgré leurs blessures. Lors d'une patrouille, la frégate est tombée sur un vaisseau aeldari qui traversait le système et a immédiatement décidé d'attaquer les ennemis de l'humanité. Le vaisseau xénos s'est révélé trop rapide et fuyant, mais ses moteurs sont subitement tombés en panne, laissant à la frégate une chance de frapper. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the scouts managed to rescue several emaciated officers from the wrecked ship. Despite their wounds, they were able to tell us what had happened: during a patrol, the frigate discovered an Aeldari ship crossing the system and decided to immediately attack the enemies of Humanity. The xenos vessel proved too fast and skittish, but at one point its engines failed, giving the frigate a chance to attack."

Le vaisseau xénos s'est révélé trop rapide et fuyant, mais ses moteurs sont subitement tombés en panne, laissant à la frégate une chance de frapper. »

languages.text: "Lord Captain, den Spähern ist es gelungen, aus dem Schiffswrack mehrere abgemagerte Offiziere zu retten. Sie hatten mehrere Verletzungen, konnten uns aber berichten, was passiert war. Während einer Patrouille durch das System stieß die Fregatte auf ein Aeldari-Schiff und griff die Feinde der Menschheit sofort an. Das Xenos-Schiff war zu schnell und unberechenbar, aber irgendwann fielen die Triebwerke aus und die Fregatte konnte angreifen."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the scouts managed to rescue several emaciated officers from the wrecked ship. Despite their wounds, they were able to tell us what had happened: during a patrol, the frigate discovered an Aeldari ship crossing the system and decided to immediately attack the enemies of Humanity. The xenos vessel proved too fast and skittish, but at one point its engines failed, giving the frigate a chance to attack."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, den Spähern ist es gelungen, aus dem Schiffswrack mehrere abgemagerte Offiziere zu retten. Sie hatten mehrere Verletzungen, konnten uns aber berichten, was passiert war. Das Xenos-Schiff war zu schnell und unberechenbar, aber irgendwann fielen die Triebwerke aus und die Fregatte konnte angreifen."

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, los exploradores han rescatado varios oficiales moribundos de la nave. A pesar de las heridas que presentaban, han podido contarnos lo que ha pasado: mientras patrullaban, encontraron una nave Aeldari cruzando el sistema y decidieron atacar a los enemigos de la Humanidad. La nave xenos resultó ser demasiado rápida y escurridiza, pero sus motores comenzaron a fallar. Esto permitió que la fragata lanzara un ataque».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the scouts managed to rescue several emaciated officers from the wrecked ship. Despite their wounds, they were able to tell us what had happened: during a patrol, the frigate discovered an Aeldari ship crossing the system and decided to immediately attack the enemies of Humanity. The xenos vessel proved too fast and skittish, but at one point its engines failed, giving the frigate a chance to attack."

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, los exploradores han rescatado varios oficiales moribundos de la nave. A pesar de las heridas que presentaban, han podido contarnos lo que ha pasado: mientras patrullaban, encontraron una nave Aeldari cruzando el sistema y decidieron atacar a los enemigos de la Humanidad. La nave xenos resultó ser demasiado rápida y escurridiza, pero sus motores comenzaron a fallar. Esto permitió que la fragata lanzara un ataque».

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、斥候が難破した船から衰弱した士官数名を救出しました。満身創痍にもかかわらず、彼らは何が起こったかを話してくれました。パトロール中、フリゲート艦は星系を横切るアエルダリ船を発見し、直ちにその人類の敵を攻撃したそうです。異種族の船はあまりに速く用心深かったものの、ある時エンジンが故障し、フリゲートに攻撃のチャンスを与えました」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the scouts managed to rescue several emaciated officers from the wrecked ship. Despite their wounds, they were able to tell us what had happened: during a patrol, the frigate discovered an Aeldari ship crossing the system and decided to immediately attack the enemies of Humanity. The xenos vessel proved too fast and skittish, but at one point its engines failed, giving the frigate a chance to attack."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、斥候が難破した船から衰弱した士官数名を救出しました。満身創痍にもかかわらず、彼らは何が起こったかを話してくれました。パトロール中、フリゲート艦は星系を横切るアエルダリ船を発見し、直ちにその人類の敵を攻撃したそうです。異種族の船はあまりに速く用心深かったものの、ある時エンジンが故障し、フリゲートに攻撃のチャンスを与えました」

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, keşif erleri geminin enkazından zayıf düşmüş birkaç subayı kurtarabilmiş. Yaralarına rağmen olan biteni anlattılar. Fırkateyn, devriye sırasında sistemden geçen bir Aeldari gemisi tespit etmiş ve derhâl İnsanlığın düşmanlarına saldırmaya karar vermiş. Zeno gemisi, beklediklerinden hızlı ve ürkek çıkmış ama nihayetinde motorlarından biri iflas etmiş. Böylece fırkateyn için saldırı şansı doğmuş."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the scouts managed to rescue several emaciated officers from the wrecked ship. Despite their wounds, they were able to tell us what had happened: during a patrol, the frigate discovered an Aeldari ship crossing the system and decided to immediately attack the enemies of Humanity. The xenos vessel proved too fast and skittish, but at one point its engines failed, giving the frigate a chance to attack."
